name: Tag EverWebinar Attendees in KlickTipp
description:
This scenario automatically tags EverWebinar registrants in KlickTipp based on their live attendance behavior.

The scenario fetches attendance data from EverWebinar and checks whether contacts attended the webinar session and how long they stayed. Based on this, the scenario applies specific tags in KlickTipp.

It supports different webinars and assigns tags for people who attended live, stayed for most of the session, or did not attend at all. This allows you to create personalized follow-up email sequences or segment your list based on engagement.

This setup is useful for webinar funnels where you want to track user behavior and trigger targeted automation depending on how they participated in the live session.
